news.title: 72 Days 272 Questions 0 Jawaab
news.author: John Doe
news.description: After 72 days and 272 questions, the government remains silent on major issues, sparking nationwide debates and protests.

news.title: INC MANIFESTO
news.author: Sarah Smith
news.description: The Indian National Congress releases its manifesto, promising economic reforms, employment growth, and social justice.

news.title: YUVA NYAY
news.author: Rajesh Kumar
news.description: A new initiative, 'Yuva Nyay,' aims to empower the youth with better education, job opportunities, and financial assistance.

news.title: Another News

news.description: Cycling enthusiasts celebrate World Bicycle Day with a citywide rally promoting eco-friendly transportation.

news.title: New Policy Announcement
news.author: Michael Johnson
news.description: The government announces a new policy focused on sustainable development and green energy initiatives.
